algorithm_technique: Maintain a set of current OR values and update it with new ORs from each element.
Iterate through subarrays, compute OR, and store distinct values in a set.
problem_summary_simple: Count the number of unique bitwise OR values from all contiguous subarrays.
problem_summary_technical: Uses dynamic programming with sets to efficiently track distinct bitwise ORs of all subarrays.
key_insights: The number of distinct OR values for subarrays ending at a given index is limited (at most 32).
This is because ORing with a new number can only set more bits, and there are a finite number of bits.
Using a set efficiently handles the distinctness requirement.
